channel.title: Change IP zenith client?
channel.description:
Any know how i can change the IP of the zenith client?
I already changed Client.jar and loader.jar
But when my friends open the client it doenst update??

item.title: Change IP zenith client?
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

bad news my friend…

go into Client.java, search for server = "ip here"; change the text ‘ip here’ to your ip address, then close, save and compile.
you’ll then have to re-jar the client. give the re-jarred product to your friends.

Read full topic

item.title: Change IP zenith client?
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

what?? you change the client ip in loader.java which is located in your client folders.

and for others to connect make you have your server ip registered with no-ip.com and you have portforwarded correctly other than that it should work fine.

Read full topic
